description: The second part of a trilogy on contemporary issues in public housing. The film examines the complexities of urban planning and the processes by which decisions are taken focussing on the William Angliss Project in Footscray, a suburb of Melbourne, Victoria. Uses archival footage, aerial shots and stills.
